name: intersegmental
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
biology between the segments (= parts) of an animal's body: An intersegmental membrane allows the body to move freely. The insect's abdomen is dark brown with pale intersegmental areas.
business between the segments (= parts) of an organization: They eliminated intersegmental revenues from the sales figures. All intersegmental trading is carefully monitored.
More examplesFewer examplesAn intersegmental region connects the head with the thorax.The larva burrows in through an intersegmental membrane and emerges fully grown about three days later.The adults have a mid-green colour with darker green intersegmental markings.
